dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 343 IH: No Taxpayer Funding for the World Health Organization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Roy (for himself, Mr. McClintock, Mr. Duncan, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Clyde, Mrs. Harshbarger, Mr. Rosendale, Mrs. Greene of Georgia, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Fallon, Mr. Biggs, Mr. Hunt, Mr. Higgins of Louisiana, and Mr. Steube) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit United States assessed and voluntary contributions to the World Health Organization.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Taxpayer Funding for the World Health Organization Act.

section.header: Prohibition on assessed and voluntary contributions to the World Health Organization
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, effective on the date of the enactment of this Act, the United States may not provide any assessed or voluntary contributions to the World Health Organization.
